about_the_game:
OVERVIEW

Insiders is a single-player, open-world survival game set within the human body. The player needs to explore the environment, mine resources, craft items, build bases, follow quests, and fight microorganisms such as viruses, parasites and bacteria while looking for a cure.

GAME HIGHLIGHTS

  • Unique environment – explore an original world like nothing else you've seen before.
  • Fight different types of viruses like coronavirus, bacterias, and parasites face to face.
  • Navigate your microship across the bloodstream, the brain, and kidneys.
  • Scan DNAs and create your own bacteria as a companion.
  • Take care of your own brain-eating pet parasite.
  • Assemble mega laser on your ship hull to destroy kidney stones.
  • Follow quests, find a cure for a cancer
  • Build, mine, craft, explore, and survive


Story

The cancer rate of human beings in this era has increased dramatically, and the only cure is inside our bodies. The technology to shrink physical objects and live human beings into microscopic size has recently been discovered, you and your ship have been shrunk and injected inside one severely ill patient with multiple diseases to find a potential cure. The patient is dying quickly, and you are the last hope of humanity to eradicate this horrible disease once and for all. Are you able to find the cure for cancer? Or are you going to find something else?


Gameplay

This is a one-way trip, your ship needs fuel and air to keep the systems running. You can harvest resources from dead microbes or mine minerals from the blood and nutrients inside the body. You can then convert these resources to important items that will aid you in your mission. You can craft weapons, mining lasers, shields, engines and other ships components. You can also upgrade your ship software to increase speed and energy.


Combat

Your ship can use its shields to block enemy attacks or use evasive maneuvers to dodge enemy projectiles or escape from hordes of bacterias. You have cannons and ray weapons at your disposal. In time you will learn to craft even more advanced weapons and upgrade your ship to fight stronger more volatile enemies.


Scavenge

You can find unmanned crashed ships from previous missions inside the human body. Those wrecks could contain resources, special items, enhanced weapons and ship upgrades beneficial to your mission and your survival.


Base Building

The Building system is like a building kit. You would need to create a base frame first and attach important buildings to the frame for your survival. You can craft and build bases to store your resources, repair your ship and instantly teleport among bases. You can also build automated factories to manufacture advanced items and weapons.


Warning

This game contains flashing lights that may make it unsuitable for people with photosensitive epilepsy or other photosensitive conditions. Player discretion is advised.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: windows 7 or newer, 64-bit
  • Processor: 2.7 GHz single core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3GB GDDR3 (1600MHz)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum resolution is 1360 x 768. Insiders is an Early Access game, and recommended specifications may change during development
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: windows 7 or newer, 64-bit
  • Processor: 3.5 GHz quad-core (i5)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB GDDR5 (7010 MHz)
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum resolution is 1360 x 768. Insiders is an Early Access game, and recommended specifications may change during development

short_description: Welcome to the dangerous micro world hidden inside the human body. Pilot an advanced microship through the bloodstream, brain and kidneys. Mine resources, fight microbes, craft ship modules and weapons, build bases, discover new microorganisms and find a cure for cancer. Don’t get eaten!
supported_languages:
English*, Czech, German, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
